Branch - Class in bank
 
Branch(int) - Constructor for class bank.Branch
Object constructor that takes in a specific id which is the branch code and read each specific data in the file Helps in displaying the values of each attribute that a branch has and segregate them by their branch code useful for viewBranches() only It reads Branch.csv as the data contains branch code, branch name, branch reserve, opening and closing hours for loop is used for assigning the attributes into an array and then displaying them as a full list of branches

checkAvailability() - Method in class bank.Branch
checkAvailability retrieves the opening and closing hours of the branch and assign it to the variables, open and close it calls for the current time with the use of LocalTime an if statement is created to check if the current time is after closing time or before opening time if they are then, it will display a message to come again tomorrow if not then it will tell the user that the branch is currently open

F

ForeignCurrencies() - Method in class account.ForeignX
ForeignCurrencies() reads the data from FX csv to retrieve the latest currency rates A dictionary is created to store the values to the specific currency for efficiency By initializing the currencies as "Keys", we can access the values of the currency assigned
foreignX - Variable in class account.Account
 
ForeignX - Class in account
ForeignX class is used to store information of the user's foreign currency balance of different currencies It also stores the currency rates from SGD to different countries The class is connected to the Account class as it uses the same account ID to perform the transactions for foreign exchange
ForeignX(int, float) - Constructor for class account.ForeignX
Special class constructor for class private attributes

I

insurance - Variable in class account.Account
 
Insurance - Class in account
Insurance class will be used to store and access insurance policy information both specific to the user and generically as a catalogue.
Insurance(String) - Constructor for class account.Insurance
Object constructor to be used for initialising a single insurance policy.
Insurance(String, String, String, double, double, LocalDate, LocalDate) - Constructor for class account.Insurance
Generic class constructor for class private attributes.
InsuranceCatalog - Class in bank
InsuranceCatalog class is used by the Bank main class to get information on available insurance policies sold by the bank Available policies are stored on the Insurance.csv file and each entry has 6 fields 1.PolicyNumber, 2.PolicyName, 3.Insurance Type, 4.Premium Balance, 5.Start Date and 6.End Date
InsuranceCatalog() - Constructor for class bank.InsuranceCatalog
Constructor that gets insurance policy information stored on the filepath data\\Insurance.csv and initialises the policyInfo arrayList attribute with String[] values

V

validateOTP(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if the input argument matches the one found in OTP hashmap, otpMap Method has 3 conditions: Valid User ID, Non-expired OTP and Correct One-time password value If any of the three conditions fail, return a False value.
validatePassword(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if input password matches password stored in password Hashmap, userPwdMap.
viewBranches() - Method in class bank.Branch
Function to view the list of branches by looping through the array that has been instantised It will display every branch detail according to the branch code
viewCurrencies() - Method in class account.ForeignX
viewCurrencies() is for the purpose of printing the latest currency rates for user to keep up to date It prints out the dictionary in a form of a 'key : value'
